data.name: XPlayer
desc: is the multimedia stream handling interface.
This allows to perform every basic operation on videos and sounds.

methods.name: createFrameGrabber
desc: gets a frame grabber for this stream.

methods.name: createPlayerWindow
desc: gets a new player window for this stream control

methods.name: getMediaTime
desc: gets the current position of the cursor in the stream

methods.name: getVolumeDB
desc: gets the current audio volume in decibel

methods.name: isMute
desc: gets whether the volume is temporarily down to 0 or not.

methods.name: isPlaybackLoop
desc: indicates whether the stream reading will restart after the end of the stream.

methods.name: isPlaying
desc: indicates whether the stream is played or not.

methods.name: setMediaTime
desc: sets the new cursor position in the media stream.
After using this method the stream is stopped.

methods.name: setMute
desc: sets the volume to 0 or to its previous value.

methods.name: setPlaybackLoop
desc: sets whether the stream reading should restart at the stream start after the end of the stream.

methods.name: setVolumeDB
desc: sets the audio volume in decibel.

methods.name: start
desc: starts reading the stream from the current position.

methods.name: stop
desc: stops reading the stream and leave the cursor at its current position.
